__e: What are fairies' houses made of?
Are you sure these little people are kids?
What, and put my snowflake fairies back to work?
I just can't believe that my son's the bad guy in this fucking demented fairy tale of yours.
If you ask very hard to bring us tales of Mom and Dad?
But... then slowly, over time, everything changes, and you're no longer this young thing and you don't believe in fairy tales and "perfect" isn't in your vocabulary.
Who was stolen away to a fairy court and who was raised and learnt his magic...
I've been around more than my fair share of faeries and halflings over the past few years.
